/*
Success is a matter of hanging on, when others have let go.
Its not who you are, that holds you back, its who you think you are not.
The future belongs to those, who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
*/
//{
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<time.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<limits.h>

#define MOD 1000000007LL
#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define ABS(x)   ((x)<0?-(x):(x))

//}
#define size 5000
void precompute(){
}//end precompute
void refresh(){
}

void doThis(){
    int arr[size]={0};
    int n = size-1;
    int num,pow;
    scanf("%d %d",&num,&pow);
    int temp=num;
    int temp_count = n;
    while(temp){
        arr[temp_count--]=temp%10;
        temp/=10;
    }
    int i,c,j,t;
    for(i=1;i<pow;i++){
        c=0;
        for(j=n;j>=0;j--){
        t=arr[j]*num+c;
        arr[j]=t%10;
        c=t/10;

        }
    }

    i=0;
    while(arr[i]==0){
    i++;
    }
    int sum = 0;
    for(j=i;j<=n;j++){
    printf("%d",arr[j]);
    sum+=arr[j];
    }
    printf(" %d",sum);
    printf("\n");



}//end doThis


int main(){
#ifdef amy
freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
freopen("log.txt", "w", stderr);
#endif
    int t;
	precompute();
	t=1;
	//scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
	    doThis();
    }//end while
#ifdef amy
fprintf(stdout, "\nTime taken : %.3lf   sec\n", (double) clock() /(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));
#endif
	return 0;
}//end main
